greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of compositions of n with exactly k (possibly overlapping) occurrences of the consecutive pattern 111; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, 0<=k<=max(0,n-2), read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..150, flattened
mathematica: b[n_, t_] := b[n, t] = If[n==0, 1, Expand[Sum[If[Abs[t] != j, b[n-j, j], If[t<0, x, 1]*b[n-j, -j]], {j, 1, n}]]]; T[n_] := Function[p, Table[ Coefficient[p, x, i], {i, 0, Exponent[p, x]}]][b[n, 0]]; Table[T[n], {n, 0, 15}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 08 2017, translated from Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Nov 23 2013
